com.sibvisions.rad.remote.vertx

Class NetSocketConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sibvisions.rad.remote.AbstractSerializedConnection
      • com.sibvisions.rad.remote.vertx.NetSocketConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConnection

    public class NetSocketConnection
extends AbstractSerializedConnection
    The NetSocketConnection is an IConnection that uses a NetSocket for the communication to a NetServer.
